title: UNM Regents pass resolution encouraging 120 credit hour degrees (The University of New Mexico)
text: ( Source : The University of New Mexico ) (l to r) Robert Doughty, regent; Jack L . Fortner, president UNM Board of Regents ; UNM President Robert Frank The University of New Mexico Board of Regents unanimously passed a resolution at its October
